data.description: <p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span><span style="font-family:Verdana, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>There are over 7 billion people on this planet. And by 2050, there will be 2 billion more... many moving into urban centers at an unprecedented rate. Making sure there is enough food, fiber and infrastructure for our rapidly growing world is what we're all about at John Deere. And it's why we're investing in our people and our technology like never before! Here the world's brightest minds are tackling the world's biggest challenges. If you believe one person can make the world a better place, we'll put you to work. RIGHT NOW.</span></span></span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"> </span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:10.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><em><span>John Deere is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regards to, among other things, race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with disability.</span></em></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><b><span>Primary Location:</span></b><span> United States (US)</span><span> - Illinois</span><span> - Moline</span><span> <br><b>Function:</b> Data and Analytics (CA)</span><br><span><b>Title: </b>Part Time Student - Data Analytics - Moline, IL OR Johnston, IA</span><span> - 115777</span> <br><b><span>Onsite/Remote:</span></b><span>Onsite Position</span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><b>Note: Relocation assistance is not provided.</b></span></span></p><p> </p><p><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><em>The Part-Time Student Program is primarily designed to augment the Companyâ€™s regular full-time staff and is for students who work in parallel to their school schedule <b>YEAR-ROUND</b>.</em></span></span></p><div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>Your Responsibilities</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">As a <strong>Part Time Student - Data Analytics</strong> for <strong>John Deere Financial in Johnston, IA or John Deere Commons in Moline, IL</strong>, you will:</span></p><p> </p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Assist the Global Workforce Analytics team with data requests.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ensure data integrity by reviewing and validating information across platforms.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Learn and apply data science techniques to audit, clean, transform, validate, and analyze workforce data.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Automate and optimize repetitive data tasks using scripting or workflow tools (e.g., Python, Power Automate).</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Design and maintain analytics products and reporting that inform business decisions.</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ensure strict confidentiality and data protection when handling sensitive HR information.</span></li></ul><p> </p><p><strong><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">VISA Sponsorship is NOT available for this position</span></strong></p><p> </p><p> </p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>What Skills You Need</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">School and/or work experience analyzing text and/or numerical data</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">High level attention to detail and accuracy</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Available to work during the academic year 16-20 hours/weekly</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Available to work during the summer semester 30-40 hours/weekly</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Must be able to commute to John Deere Financial in Johnston, IA or John Deere Commons in Moline, IL</span><br /><br /></li></ul><p> </p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>What Makes You Stand Out</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Experience with Python and SQL programming languages</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Experience with Power Automate</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Experience developing in Tableau and/or Power BI</span></li></ul><p> </p><p> </p></div></div><div style='padding: 10px 0px;border: 1px solid transparent;'><div style='font-size:16px;word-wrap: break-word;'><H2 style='font-size: 1em; margin: 0px'><b>Education</b></H2>&#13;</div><div><p> </p><p><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ideally you will have a degree or equivalent related work experience in the following:</span></p><p> </p><ul><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Ideally pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Data Analytics, Data Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Stats, or Human Resources (others may apply)</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Must be registered as a full-time student at a U.S. accredited college/university</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Graduation date of December 2026 or later</span></li><li><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: arial, helvetica, sans-serif;">Cumulative GPA of 2.8 or above</span></li></ul><p> </p><p> </p></div></div></div><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>At John Deere, you are empowered to create a career that will take you to where you want to go while working in an inclusive team environment. Here, you'll enjoy the freedom to explore new projects, the support to think outside the box and the advanced tools and technology that foster innovation and achievement. Additionally, we offer a comprehensive reward package to help you get started on your new career path, including:</span></span></span></p><ul><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Flexible work arrangements</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Highly competitive base pay and performance bonuses</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Savings &amp; Retirement benefits (401K and Defined Benefit Pension)</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Healthcare benefits with a generous company contribution in the Health Savings Account</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Adoption assistance</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Employee Assistance Programs</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Tuition assistance</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Fitness subsidies and on-site gyms at specific Deere locations</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Charitable contribution match</span></span></span></li><li><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Employee Purchase Plan &amp; numerous discount programs for personal use</span></span></span></li></ul><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px">$15 - $40 hourly based on published rates for business function and education level.</p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-left:3.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:12.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span>Follow this link to learn more about our Total Rewards Package <a href="https://bit.ly/3XCd8fL"><span style="color:blue">https://bit.ly/3XCd8fL</span></a> </span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px">Must be 18 years of age or older to apply</p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt"><span>The information contained herein is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all responsibilities and qualifications required of individuals performing the job. The qualifications detailed in this job description are not considered the minimum requirements necessary to perform the job, but rather as guidelines.</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt"><span>The terms of the applicable benefit plans, and all company actions administering or interpreting these plans, continue to control. Deere &amp; Company reserves the right to suspend, amend, modify, or terminate the Plan(s) in any manner at any time, including the right to modify or eliminate any cost-sharing between the company and participants. Changes, which can be made at any time, are made by action of the company's board of directors, or to the extent authorized by resolution of its board of directors, or by the Deere &amp; Company Compensation Committee. In the event of a conflict between the language of the official Plan Documents and this document, the language of the official Plan Documents will control.</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"> </p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-family:Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"><span style="font-size:10.0pt"><span style="font-size:7.0pt"><span>ACA Section 1557 Nondiscrimination Notice</span></span></span></span></p><p style="margin-bottom:1.0px;margin-top:3.0px"><span style="font-size:9.0px"><span style="font-family:Aptos, sans-serif"><em>The John Deere Health Benefit Plans for Salaried Employees and The John Deere Benefit Plan for Wage Employees comply with applicable Federal civil rights laws and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, age, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with disability.</em></span></span></p>
